template.name: Welcome
template.subject: Welcome to OpenGrooves!
template.html:
Welcome to OpenGrooves!

Thank you [[USERNAME]] for registering your account! We greatly appreciate the support of new members in order to help OpenGrooves grow.

HOW TO GET STARTED:

1. Connect to bands in your area
2. Receive updates to new shows and events
3. That's it!

Once again, we truly appreciate your support. If you like what you see, spread the word! The more, the merrier!

template.name: BetaTestWelcome
template.subject: Welcome to the OpenGrooves pre-launch!
template.html:
Welcome to OpenGrooves!

Thank you, [[USERNAME]], for registering your account! We greatly appreciate the support of new members in order to help OpenGrooves grow.

In case you lose it, your password is: [[PASSWORD]]

As you may or may not know...

You are part of a group of very, VERY early adopters. The site itself is still in an open beta. With that said, you may come across bugs that not yet been discovered. OpenGrooves is a home-grown, Baltimore-based effort by two local musicians. We are not a company looking to extort or sell your information. We truly want to create an easy-to-use platform for discovering local bands and events in your area.

Again, we truly appreciate your support. Thank you. If you like what you see, spread the word! The more, the merrier!

template.name: Activate
template.subject: Activate your OpenGrooves account
template.html:
Greetings, [[USERNAME]],

You recently registered for an account with OpenGrooves.com. Please take a moment to confirm your e-mail address by clicking on the link below:

Activate my account

OR: [[LINK]]

If the link is not active, please copy and past the link into your web browser. Once we've verified your e-mail address, you can continue to set up your profile and start connecting with other bands! Thanks for joining!
